title: 2BR / 1 BA with Garage Parking Somerville!
posting_body: 2BR / 1Ba 1200 sq.
ft.
Space: 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, full kitchen w/dishwasher, dining room, living room, 3rd spare bedroom/office/bonus room, 2 enclosed porches for storage.
Location and Transportation: Easy access to Davis Square Red Line, 87/88/89 Bus routes at Clarendon Hill, rt 2, and I-93.
Parking: 1 driveway spot and street parking (with permit).
Utility Information: Washer and dryer in the basement, RCN and Comcast availability, steam heat (gas boiler).

Description: Spacious 2 bedroom, 2nd floor apartment with 1 bathroom, dining room with dual hutch, living room, full kitchen with gas range/oven and dishwasher, 3rd bonus room / office with cabinet, 2 enclosed porches for storage, modern laundry machines in basement (no charge), 1 open garage parking space up private driveway and ample street parking nearby with permit.
This apartment sits right across from Alewife reservation with walking/biking paths to Alewife and up to Mystic Lake.
Easy access to public transportation with a 5min walk to the 88/87/89 Clarendon Hill Bus to Davis Sq, or a 15min walk to Davis Sq itself.
Have a car?
One driveway spot in a garage is included with a 5min drive to I-93 or rt 2.
Gas and electric are serviced by Eversource (not included in rent).
There is RCN and Comcast availability for Internet/TV.
Rental Terms:
$2000 per month
Available: September 1st
First, Last and Security, NO FEE
Looking for two occupants (current tenant is moving out Sept. 1st)
Pet allowed following landlord approval
Driveway and sidewalk snow removal required in tandem with other unit
New tenants can repaint with approval from landlord
No Smoking
